typedef long long lint;
typedef unsigned long long ull;

void prepare()
{
#ifdef _DEBUG
     freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
#endif
}

typedef long double ld;

ld power( ld a, int n )
{
	double r = 1.0;
	while ( n )
	{
		if ( n & 1 )
			r *= a;
		a *= a;
		n >>= 1;
	}
	return r;
}

bool solve()
{
	ld ans = 0.0;
	int n,l;
	cin >> n >> l;
	if ( n == 1 )
	{
		ans = l + 1;
	}
	else
	{
		ans = 1.0;
		for ( int h = 1; h <= l; h ++ )
		{
			for ( int i = 0; i < n; i ++ )
			{
				ld cur = power( 0.5, h );
				ans += power( (ld)1.0 - cur , i );
			}
		}
	}
	printf("%.2lf\n", (double)ans);
	return false;
}

int main()
{
	prepare();
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	for ( int i = 0; i < t; i ++ )
		solve( );
	return 0;
}
